oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Songwriter Session - Emily Shackelton - 2017-04-22
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by Emily Shackelton from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on April 22, 2017. Includes questions from the audience.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Emily Shackelton;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Opening comments and introduction of songwriters by Abi Tapia / (01:57)Opening comments from Emily / (02:55) Performs Why, Baby Why / (08:12) Talks about how the next song became featured on the Nashville TV show / (09:57) Performs Love Like Mine / (13:28) Answers question about how she got her start as a songwriter and how songs get to artists / (17:11) Answers question about artist's changing her songs / (18:14) Answers question about her first big breaks as a songwriter / (19:11) Answers question and talks about inspiration for writing the next song / (21:55) Performs I Loved You First / (25:23) Answers question about her husband and their work schedules / (26:47) Answers question about why she chose songwriting over being an artist / (29:47) Answers question about Nashville and gives advice on why she stays there / (31;20) Answers question and gives advice about performing / (32:00) Answers question about co-writing songs /

(33:13) Answers question about how to make co-writing connections / (34:26) Answers question about having songs go on hold for an artist / (36:42) Answers question about where her song I Loved You First can be purchased / (36:32) Answers question about the biggest influence on her career / (37:34) Answers question about her favorite artists / (39:30) Performs Think Outside The Boy / (43:21) Answers question about what she does to get over writers block / (44:18) Answers question about what a typical day for her is like / (46:10) Answers question about how songwriters make money / (46:48) Talks about her song that Carly Pearce just recorded / (47:34) Performs Every Little Thing / (50:33) Closing comments / (50:49) Walk-out music / (51:30) FILE END
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Shackelton, Emily; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
